name: The Adventures of Blobby the Brave: The Story Begins
name_original: The Adventures of Blobby the Brave: The Story Begins
description:
This is the story of a little creature of light, and the beginning of his journey to save his village from an unknown creature. 

  • Collect hi jump power ups and health cubes
  • Dodge and overcome difficult obstacles
  • Time jumps between moving platforms
  • Fight against Smiley, the boss of this chapter.
